invalid_credentials: Invalid email or password or account doesn't exist
instruction1: The Duration for the Test will be 2.5 hours i.e. 150 mins.
instruction2: The test contains 100 Questions which consists of questions of subjects Physics, Chemistry, Maths and English.
instruction3: Two marks for each correct answer shall be awarded.
instruction4: For each wrong answer and more than one attempted answer minus 0.5 (half) mark shall be added on obtained marks.
instruction5: Unattempted answers will have zero marks.
